prompt: Cartoon style illustration of Maharana Pratap, a brave Rajput king with a strong muscular build, thick black mustache, wearing traditional orange and gold warrior armor and a distinct Rajasthani turban with a jewel. He is riding his magnificent white horse, Chetak, through the dusty, golden-hued battlefield of Haldighati. Chetak is galloping at high speed, mane flowing in the wind. The environment is filled with dust clouds and distant silhouettes of soldiers. The lighting is intense and dramatic.
